metadata.title: ALAZA Vintage Tentacles Swim Trunks Quick Dry Beach Shorts Beachwear with Mesh Lining Bathing Suits for Men
features: Material- Polyester Fabric and Mesh Lining
5 Sizes To Choose-This swim trunk for men have 5 sizes to chooseï¼šS/M/L/XL/XXL
Adjustable Elastic Waistband-The swim trunk for men has elasticized waistband with drawstring and can be freely adjusted according to your waist.
Two Side Pockets-The swim trunk has two side pockets and it is more convenient for you to put small essentials such as phone, keys, card and so on.
Occasion-This swim trunk is suitable for swimming, fishing,surfing,beach vacation and other outdoor activities
